thread.title: NJ Lawsuit Funding Firm, Fair Rate Funding, Supports Local Scholarship Fund
thread.title_full: NJ Lawsuit Funding Firm, Fair Rate Funding, Supports Local Scholarship Fund - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: NJ Lawsuit Funding Firm, Fair Rate Funding, Supports Local Scholarship Fund
text:
Fair Rate Funding
MANASQUAN, N.J. , Oct. 13, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Fair Rate Funding, a New Jersey lawsuit funding company, pledged its support to The Pat Smith Memorial Scholarship Fund, a non-profit organization that raises funds for graduating seniors. Fair Rate Funding announced its sponsorship of The Pat Smith Memorial Scholarship Funds 3 rd Annual Benefit, scheduled for Sunday, October 18 th , 2015 at 1pm .
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151013/276345LOGO
Patricia Smith was a long time Belmar NJ resident, St. Rose Alumni, loving mother, wife, sister, daughter and friend who had a long hard fought battle with breast cancer. Pat was a dedicated and valued instructional assistant in the Special Education Department who helped many students succeed and reach their academic potential. The Board approved the award to be presented by the Smith family and the Kennett High School Special Education Department, faculty, and staff in memory of Pat Smith . This award will be presented to a graduating senior who has demonstrated outstanding determination and has overcome academic and personal challenges during his/her lifetime at Kennett High School.
The event will take place at the Shore House Bar and Grill in Point Pleasant, New Jersey and will coincide with the NJ Devils-NY Rangers hockey game. For more information regarding the Pat Smith Memorial Fund 3 rd Annual Benefit, please visit: https://www.facebook.com/events/873774562677788/ .
Paul Coppola , President of the national lawsuit funding firm, Fair Rate Funding, commented on the event and Fair Rate Funding's support. "We are always interested in supporting our local charities in reaching their goals. The scholarship is awarded to a graduating senior who has overcome adversity and is going to college to further their education. We feel this is a worthwhile cause and anyone who has the time can join us as well."
100% of the proceeds are donated to the scholarship fund.
Kerrie Smith , who is heavily involved in garnering support for the Pat Smith Memorial Scholarship Fund, spoke of the Fund's appreciation. "We are so grateful to have Fair Rate Funding as a supporter. The Pat Smith Memorial Scholarship Fund is funded entirely through donations and fundraising efforts. We simply could not operate without the support of local companies such as Fair Rate Funding."
Fair Rate Funding is a settlement funding firm located in Manasquan , New Jersey. The company provides lawsuit cash advances to plaintiffs while they wait for their lawsuit to reach settlement. For more information about Fair Rate Funding and its services, visit http://fairratefunding.com or simply call a representative at 888-964-2224. Additional information can be found at http://professionalsettlementfunding.com .
The event is free to everyone and starts at 1pm as the puck drops during the Devils-Rangers Hockey game. Come out and enjoy food and drink specials, raffles, door prizes and of course the 50/50!
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/nj-lawsuit-funding-firm-fair-rate-funding-supports-local-scholarship-fund-300158688.html
